name: Ceiling Run
description:
Fast 2D platformer. There is a cake at the end. Your goal is to get it as fast as possible. Run across several levels filled with dangers like mice, ladybugs, flies and other deadly creatures. Beat high score, earn medals and collect all the coins to make the perfect run!

Art:
Kenney http://www.kenney.nl
Jose Maria Atencia http://opengameart.org/users/jmatencia

Music & SoundFX:
TeknoAXE http://teknoaxe.com/
Bfxr http://www.bfxr.net/
